/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sun is shining brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
